name: Light's Out (Keegan77)
description:
Warning: This game contains flashing lights!

Who keeps turning off the lights?

Light's Out is a retro 2D platformer! A short and sweet adventure where a mysterious character keeps flickering the light on and off, affecting the level each time.

- Won "Best Showcase" at the Fitchburg State University jam site!

Submission for the Global Game Jam 2022

CONTROLS: WASD - Movement Space - Jump Esc - Exits game Credits: Programming: Keegan B. Assets: Max Eisenhaure Music: Eric Skiff - A Night Of Dizzy Spells
